# MKSelectionAccessory.MapItemDetailPresentationStyle

**Class**

The type of map item detail accessory presentation to use.

## Declaration

```swift
class MapItemDetailPresentationStyle
```

## Creating a presentation style

- **automatic(presentationViewController:)**: An appropriate presentation style will be chosen automatically.
- **automatic(presentationViewController:)**: An appropriate presentation style will be chosen automatically.
- **callout**: Show map item detail as an annotation callout on the map.
- **callout(_:)**: Show map item detail as an annotation callout on the map
- **openInMaps**: Display a small “Open in Apple Maps” link.
- **sheet(presentedFrom:)**: Show map item detail by presenting a sheet.

## Place information

- **MKMapItemDetailViewControllerDelegate**: The methods that you use to receive events from an associated map view controller.
- **MKMapItemDetailViewController**: An object that displays detailed information about a map item.
- **MKSelectionAccessory**: The type of accessory to display for a selected annotation.
- **MKSelectionAccessory.MapItemDetailPresentationStyle.CalloutStyle**: The style to use for a map item detail callout presentation.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
